title: Math Explorers
description: A hands-on exploration of basic math concepts through fun games and activities.

title: Intro to Chemistry
description: Discover the fascinating world of chemistry through simple, safe experiments.

title: Beginner Violin
description: Learn how to play the violin and understand music basics in a club setting.

title: Painting with Nature
description: Use natural materials and paint to create art inspired by the outdoors.

title: Junior Engineers
description: Build and test fun contraptions while learning the basics of engineering.

title: Creative Writing Lab
description: Develop storytelling and writing skills through engaging prompts and peer feedback.

title: Space Explorers Club
description: Learn about planets, stars, and rockets through fun weekly club sessions.

title: Art Around the World
description: Explore art styles and techniques from different cultures and continents.

title: Coding with Scratch
description: Learn to code animations and games using Scratch in a fun and creative way.

title: Robotics 101
description: Build and program basic robots using Lego Mindstorms kits.

title: Math Magic Tricks
description: Explore surprising math-based magic tricks and uncover how they work.

title: Young Scientists Lab
description: Weekly experiments and science challenges to ignite curiosity and critical thinking.

title: Digital Art Studio
description: Create art using digital tools, tablets, and drawing software.

title: Nature Writing Workshop
description: Write poems and short stories inspired by the natural world.

title: Debate Club
description: Learn to present arguments clearly and respectfully in a supportive setting.

title: Web Design for Kids
description: Build your first website using HTML, CSS, and design tools.

title: Chess Strategy
description: Improve your chess skills and compete in fun practice games.

title: Rocket Builders
description: Design, build, and launch mini rockets safely under supervision.

title: Theater Games
description: Practice drama techniques, improv games, and build confidence on stage.

title: Digital Photography
description: Learn the basics of composition, lighting, and digital editing.

title: Mindful Movement
description: A gentle movement and mindfulness class to develop balance and focus.

title: Eco Warriors Club
description: Learn how to take care of the planet through hands-on environmental projects.

title: Advanced Math Puzzles
description: Challenge your brain with logic problems and advanced puzzles.

title: Poetry Jam
description: Write, read, and perform poetry in a relaxed and fun setting.

title: World History Adventures
description: Travel through history with games, storytelling, and activities.

title: Young Entrepreneurs
description: Create and pitch your own business ideas in this interactive course.

title: Astronomy Night
description: Learn about constellations and space science in a fun evening session.

title: Young Botanists
description: Discover the world of plants with growing, drawing, and experiments.

title: Story Time Theater
description: Act out stories and become your favorite characters!

title: LEGO Engineering
description: Use LEGOs to solve design challenges and build unique structures.

title: Future Filmmakers
description: Plan, shoot, and edit your own short video or movie trailer.

title: Public Speaking Bootcamp
description: Overcome stage fright and learn how to speak clearly and confidently.

title: Mind Benders Club
description: Solve logic puzzles, riddles, and brain teasers in teams.

title: Keyboard Basics
description: Learn keyboarding and typing skills for school and beyond.

title: Intro to Spanish
description: Learn basic Spanish greetings, numbers, and everyday phrases.

title: Photography Walk
description: Take a walk with cameras and learn to capture nature's beauty.

title: Young Medics
description: Learn first-aid, body systems, and how to stay safe and healthy.

title: Storybook Science
description: Read picture books and do science experiments related to the stories.

title: Art & Math Mashup
description: Combine geometry and patterns with creative art projects.

title: Piano for Beginners
description: Learn piano basics and simple songs using a digital keyboard.

title: Science of Superheroes
description: Explore the real science behind superhero powers and tech.

title: Weather Watchers
description: Track weather patterns and create your own forecast.

title: Bookmaking Workshop
description: Design and bind your own book with illustrations and stories.

title: Music Makers
description: Make music with common household objects and rhythm games.

title: Mini Meteorologists
description: Learn how clouds, rain, and storms form with fun experiments.

title: Clay Creations
description: Use clay to sculpt fun characters, animals, and abstract shapes.

title: Stop Motion Animation
description: Create your own animated movie using stop-motion techniques.

title: Young Zoologists
description: Study animal habitats, behaviors, and conservation topics.

title: Origami Art
description: Fold paper into amazing animals, shapes, and flowers.

title: Beginner French
description: Learn basic French vocabulary, greetings, and songs.
